title: invwarp
description: Use FSL Invwarp to invert a FNIRT warp

inverse_warp.title: Inverse warp
inverse_warp.description: Name of output file, containing warps that are the "reverse" of those in --warp. this will be a field-file (rather than a file of spline coefficients), and it will have any affine component included as part of the displacements.
